article.title: Chart Translate: Chord Chart File Format Converter

contents.p: The MJB2Lite program I released last week allows you to generate jazz accompaniment MIDI files from chord charts stored in its own native text format or from Band-in-a-Box (BiaB) files. You can find and download many BiaB files from the Web. But what if the chords in the downloaded BiaB files aren't correct or aren't the exact ones that you want? If you have the BiaB application, you can use it to change the chords. The ChartTranslate utility allows you to do that without the BiaB application. It can also convert chord charts to formats that can be imported by Finale or Lilypond for printing.
Here's an excerpt from the README.txt file of the ChartTranslate distribution:
